label: 枝町
本: Cities in Medieval Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 44 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 1983
説明文: On the other hand, federation members were continuously as odds with such city residents without membership credentials as those living in back streets (edamachi 枝町) and tenants, as well as inferiors castes (senmin 賤民) who were altogether excluded from the city proper. [SS]
